text: hi i'm vanessa from speak english with

about buying food nope going shopping
means buying other things maybe buying
clothes or buying something for your
house this is going shopping and in the
u.s. we don't really say supermarket
very much so I want to give you another
expression you can use I'm going grocery
shopping at the grocery store to buy
some groceries I live right beside three

front window I can see three grocery
stores so when I'm cooking if I don't
have any more onions it's really easy to
just run to the grocery store and get

while I run to the store but if you

and I really like to cook Korean food

- sometimes with international grocery

are the best explanations
I don't usually buy many groceries at

I go grocery shopping in the grocery
store
and what do I buy at the grocery store I
